title: BitSwapNow
author: BitSwapNow
content: Exchange bitcoin and over 350+ digital currencies instantly to a variety of different world currencies. Custodian free swap service that is safe, quick and easy. Buy, Sell and Swap crypto on BitSwapNow.comNo sign up is required. Also can swap cross chain such as btc to xrp or ethereum to bnb. Any questions dont hesitate to ask or send me a PM. Thanks.

comments.author: s1lverbox
comments.body: Quote from: BitSwapNow on September 27, 2022, 07:04:33 PMExchange bitcoin and over 350+ digital currencies instantly to a variety of different world currencies. Custodian free swap service that is safe, quick and easy. Buy, Sell and Swap crypto on BitSwapNow.comNo sign up is required. Also can swap cross chain such as btc to xrp or ethereum to bnb. Any questions dont hesitate to ask or send me a PM. Thanks.This is another changenow bs site innit? Why u not mentioning this fact? Many in crypto knows that changenow and other similar services will hold to coins until user kyc with them. So no signup required but kyc and other crap also will apply.

comments.author: BitSwapNow
comments.body: Yes we do work with changenow. They are a great service and liquidity provider as well. I myself have never triggered a KYC on any of my swaps. Surely if you are in a sanctioned country such as North Korea or similar then yes this may lead to KYC. It is up to the exchanges discretion but you also do not have to go through with the transaction and your coins would not be "locked or held". Ultimately if your transaction is not considered high risk or fraud there is nothing to worry about.
